articles.author: Steven Brown
articles.title: EU to take AstraZeneca to court AGAIN in second round of legal action against vaccine firm - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN Commission is set to pursue a second legal case against the pharmaceutical company, AstraZeneca, over its delayed deliveries of the COVID-19 vaccine to the bloc.

articles.title: Juventus face Serie A expulsion if they don't withdraw from Super League - ESPN India
articles.description: Italian FA president Gabriele Gravina said on Monday that Juve face expulsion from Serie A if they don't withdraw from the European Super League.
articles.content:
Italian FA president Gabriele Gravina said on Monday that Juventus face expulsion from Serie A if they don't withdraw from the European Super League.
